long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Check your pronunciation with a single click while surfing the internet(Open ELSA speak website)
Note: currently only supports word. Have not supported sentence yet
Features:
+ Open selected words in Elsaâ€™s pronunciation site
+ Shortcut (Ctrl+Shift+Z) for quick access
+ Choose default action: play audio or start recording
+ Auto-start recording after audio plays
+ Hide distracting banners
+ Click words in vocab cards to open new Elsa words
